translations.app.title: Welcome to Our Angular 18 Single-Page Baseline
translations.app.description: This single page simulates a typical scenario that would require localization. We have static text, user-specific data, and a small dataset for demonstration. By integrating different localization libraries, we can measure how each approach affects loading time, memory usage, and bundle size.

translations.moreInfo.description: This block contains extra text. In a localized application, this text would be translated dynamically or at build-time, depending on which library is used.
